content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we can start the negotiation. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you want to rent an unfurnished apartment in the city center. That's a good location. I think 800 Euro per month would be a good starting price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a quite high starting price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the starting price is too high for this apartment. Let's negotiate a lower price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about we lower it to 750 Euro per month? It's a nice, newly built apartment in the city center, and the location is perfect. It's worth the price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's still quite high. How about we lower it to 650 Euro per month? I believe that would be a more reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 650 Euro per month is too low for this apartment. It's in the city center and it's newly built. I propose we meet in the middle at 700 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Meeting in the middle is a fair proposal, but I think 675 Euro per month would be more reasonable. It's still a good price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 675 Euro per month is acceptable for me. Let's make it a deal. I agree to the price of [675] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [675] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Yi-Nuo Wang. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment is a great choice, and I'm sure you'll be happy here.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
